alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charles City and northeastern Surry Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Surry. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Surry and Elberon around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Beachland and Alliance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
